scripts.prebuild: npm run data && npm run data:public
scripts.img:hero: find assets/articles -type f \( -iname '*.jpg' -o -iname '*.jpeg' -o -iname '*.png' \) -exec magick mogrify -path public/images/articles/hero -format webp -quality 82 -strip -resize 2000x2000^ -gravity center -extent 2000x1200 {} +
scripts.img:hero:jpg: find assets/articles -type f \( -iname '*.jpg' -o -iname '*.jpeg' -o -iname '*.png' \) -exec magick mogrify -path public/images/articles/hero -format jpg -quality 85 -strip -resize 2000x2000^ -gravity center -extent 2000x1200 {} +
scripts.img:card: find assets/articles -type f \( -iname '*.jpg' -o -iname '*.jpeg' -o -iname '*.png' \) -exec magick mogrify -path public/images/articles/card -format webp -quality 82 -strip -resize 1200x1200^ -gravity center -extent 1200x675 {} +
scripts.img:all: npm run img:prep && npm run img:hero && npm run img:hero:jpg && npm run img:card
